S.FORM: An ta man subal ayda idaw ku sepatay nu binacadan, Taan taman zen "Strait Island", Ciwluo wa zen, Wunci zen atu Santi neie zen. Anta man subalan a mapuletay nu lumeniay a tademaw caay tu pikihatiya tu kitakid, kaisa atu i hekalay atademaw masasuadih. picidekan tu Santi neie zen mikitalakaw tu duma a kitidaan nu tademaw, palecad tu talakaw han makaala tu caynem sep caynem lim kunhu ku talakaw, caay kaw apulet ku sausi tu nuhenian " mapuletay han a caylim sep kunhun", nipisausi ayda nu maudipay cacay tu a malebut ku maudipay. Ciwluo wa a binacadan tulim sep sipsep sep ku tademaw. 4 : (Strait Island), , . . 160 165 ( 150 ). 1000 . 250 400 .
